column10: arrived at the Office of Immigration Investigation and Procedure to ask for help to return him home.------He told officers that he had lost his passport
column11: his visa had expired and that he had no money to pay for a new extension.------The office then discovered he had arrived in the Kingdom of Cambodia in 2018 at the Siem Reap International Airport.------He was sent to the center at Ponchentong for further proceedings.------SOURCE
